predicate.note: Frames file for 'wrestle' based on sentences in financial subcorpus and automatic expansion via verbnet.

example.name: unknown competition
example.text: Even companies in smokestack industries wrestling with world-wide overcapacity are joining the boom.

example.name: merged wrestlers
example.text: John and Mary wrestled over the cause of his noxious foot odor.
example.arg: the cause of his noxious foot odor

example.name: I can't believe this hasn't occurred yet
example.text: John wrestled with Mary over the cause of his noxious foot odor.

example.name: with prize
example.text: John wrestled with Mary for the last piece of cake.

example.name: beautiful sentence
example.text: In a crush of trucks and horse carts on the trodden field, Andrzej Latowski wrestles a screeching, overweight hog into the trunk of a private butcher's Polish Fiat.
example.arg: In a crush of trucks and horse carts on the trodden field
the trunk of a private butcher's Polish Fiat

example.text: Since then, a second group of franchisees has banded together [*-1] to try [*-2] to wrestle control of the unit from Mr. Posner.
